title: So the Rylai's nerf
body: I think we are going to start seeing more {{item:3116}}  +{{item:3151}} since both of them are now cheaper! I will totally try it on Cass, it gives health, MPen, and you dont have to worry about oponents stacking health, overall, a nice dps choice for battling mages. What do you guys think? is this combination going to be more viable now? I did not do it before because yisus, it was too much gold.

replies.body:
**League Community:** "We hate getting permaslowed by Rylai's due to champions like Brand and Cass being able to apply it constantly with their DoTs and spammable abilities."

**Riot:** "... we also want the slow to be less attractive to mages who canâ€™t reapply it consistently."

Now the item sucks. Had they left the slow and nerfed the stats, it would be fine, or even if they had nerfed the slow and left the stats, it would be fine, but they totally killed it. Not worth getting on anyone who doesn't really need it.
A direct Taliyah nerf, due to the above reason of her really needing it.

No, Rylai's is literal trash now on the people who didn't already build {{item:3116}} {{item:3151}}.

1/3 slow duration.

1/2 slow value. 

3/4 stat value.
It sucks now. They should have left the stats alone and just nerfed the slow (if it was even broken at all).
I'm excited to try the new prices out on Evelynn
I agree.  Gonna be nice to try out on many champs. :)
